name: Noctambule
description:
== Game ==

Game done during the Brackeys Game Jam from 02/14/2021 to 02/21/2021.

the theme was "Stronger Together"

The goal is to gather the maximum of villager you can find and together reach the castle to save your life ! 

The more you are the easier it will be to beat the ghost.

You will also find tools like torch and sword to fight back these creatures !

== Commands == MoveWASD / ZSQD / ArrowsUpgrade villagerdrag n drop then clickMenu 
Esc      == Villagers == Ferusharder better faster rigger
Hanakeaton
